A number increases from 20 to 30 and then decreases from 30 to 20. Compare the percent of increase from 20 to 30 and that of the decrease from 30 to 20. From the following which of the following statement is true:
data.a: Percent decrease is less than the percent increase
data.b: Percent decrease is more than the percent increase
data.c: Percent increase is less than the percent increase
